domain.name: Brand Vertical

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text: @TMobile @Tesla I’d drive my new Tesla to @Ford in Detroit & show it off after @Ford refused to help replace the faulty transmission in my car. 143 miles over warranty & COVID-19 restrictions in my state wouldn’t allow me to get to a dealership sooner .$9000 to repair! #TMobileTuesdays #contest
